mdRecord.dcterms:description: These pictures are portraits of Edward F. Burk, Jr. as a student. In Pose 1 from 1912 he is wearing a graduation gown. In Pose 2 from 1913 he is wearing a sports uniform. These prints were made from the original glass plate negatives, which are housed at Virginia Historical Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portraits of Edmund F. Burk, Jr. (photographs)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Portrait photography
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
Twentieth century
Washington and Lee University
Students
